snippet.title: Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
An epic adventure returns! Together with Disney Games, we are thrilled to announce the remake of an iconic game: Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed!

Join Mickey Mouse on his magical quest and get ready to wield the power of paint and thinner once again.

Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed is coming to PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch. 

Learn more: https://epicmickey.thqnordic.com

#EpicMickeyRebrushed
